title: Our
alternative_title: 僕らのアイは気持ち悪い; Bokura no Ai wa Kimochi Warui; Nuestro Amor es Repugnante; Bokura No Ai Wa Kimochi Warui
status: 僕らのアイは気持ち悪い; Bokura no Ai wa Kimochi Warui; Nuestro Amor es Repugnante; Bokura No Ai Wa Kimochi Warui
description:
Description :
        Everyone is hiding a "secret."Azuki Komugi is obsessed with ruminating on her memories of her high school girlfriend "Meguru," and creating a body model of hers out of clay.One day, Azuki drops her homemade "Meguru" at the 100-yen shop where she works part-time, and sneaks into her workplace on her off-shift to get "her" back. However, what she sees there is a fellow co-worker, high school girl Yoyuki Remu, who is about to express her lu** for "Meguru" in a way that is different from Azuki's...+
